title: Input Control Function for ISC
description: This function evaluates whether the input byte IN is less than 32 or equal to 127, returning a boolean value indicating the result of this evaluation.
name: ISC_CTRL

input.name: IN
input.description: A byte input value that will be evaluated by the function.

return_value.description: Returns TRUE if the input IN is less than 32 or equal to 127; otherwise, returns FALSE.
